1152.content:
Karen was your average teenager, she was thirteen years old with a tomboyish personality and she was in her last year of middle school.

Today, her parents went out to celebrate their anniversary, she only had to take care of her 6 year old brother, Kyle.

Karen was in her bedroom, preparing everything to take a shower, when her brother step in.

"I want to play video games." Kyle exclaimed.

"Mom told me to not give you permission until you finished your soup, and you drop it." She said.

"I don't like soup, I want to play!" He demanded.

"Sorry, Kyle, not my problem."

Upset, Kyle dropped to the floor and threw a tantrum to obtain what he wanted, Karen simply ignored him and went to the bathroom. Knowing that he wouldn't play video games, he decided to play with her sister.

Water flows through the shower, covering Karen's small breasts and her recently sprouted brown pubic hairs, as she washes her short hair with shampoo, she hears knocking at the bathroom's door.

"Karen, I need to go to the bathroom." Kyle said.

"Can you wait a little more? I'm almost done." She responded.

"I can't, please?"

A bit tired of dealing with her brother, she accepted, closing the curtain to avoid any visual contact. Meanwhile, Kyle pretends to do his business, takes his sister's dirty clothes and her towel. He thanks her and leaves.

A few minutes later, Karen dries her hair and realizes she is missing something. "What are the hell are you doing?" Karen looks behind her and noticed that her parents were home.

Karen doesn't know what to do, so, she dresses and cries against her pillow. Kyle at the distance feels bad, he only wanted to prank his sister, but, if he admitted anything, the punishment will be worse for him.
